en-US.scriptGroup.gadgetIntervalDescription: Automatically use gadgets during movement, enter 0 to disable
en-US.scriptGroup.onlyInTeleportRecoverDescrip: Only go to Statue of the Seven to recover when path is at a teleport point
en-US.scriptGroup.skipDuringDescription: After completing a route, if the time is within the configured hours (range: 0-23), this map tracking task will be skipped. Suitable for continuous execution fallback tasks, such as wanting to AFK overnight and start executing new tasks after 4 AM.
en-US.scriptGroup.optimizeSkillCd: Optimize Character Rotation by Skill CD
en-US.scriptGroup.optimizeSkillCdDescription: Based on entered characters or character+CD, decide to skip character's turn when elemental skill CD hasn't ended, optimizing combat flow. Can enter character names or character names with numbers (comma separated), multiple entries separated by semicolons, e.g.: Baizhu;Zhongli,12; If only character name is entered, internal CD check is used (or if number is less than 0), if character name and number, the number is treated as skill CD in seconds.
en-US.scriptGroup.autoCombatEndDetectionDescri: When combat is detected to have ended, automatically stop combat function
en-US.scriptGroup.quickCombatEndCheckDescripti: Quickly check if combat has ended. During a script cycle, can check at regular intervals (default 5 seconds) or after specific character actions (when each character completes their script cycle).
en-US.scriptGroup.quickCombatEndCheckParamsDes: Parameters for faster combat end checking. Can enter numbers and character names, multiple entries separated by semicolons, e.g.: 5;Baizhu;Zhongli; If number (less than or equal to 0 means no time-based checks, unit is seconds), specifies check interval, if character name, checks after that character's action cycle. End of cycle check remains unchanged.
en-US.scriptGroup.combatEndCheckDelayDescripti: Delay for checking combat end. Different characters may have different delays after their skills end, default is 1.5 seconds. Can also specify delay for specific characters, unspecified characters use the default value. Format: 2.5;Baizhu,1.5;Zhongli,1.0;
en-US.scriptGroup.keyPressCheckDelayDescriptio: Delay for checking screen color blocks after pressing team switch key, default is 0.45 seconds. If frequent false detections occur, increase this value, e.g. to 0.75. Ensure this delay doesn't actually bring up the team configuration interface.
en-US.scriptGroup.autoPickupDropsDescription: Try to pick up nearby drops after combat (works best with Kazuha)
en-US.scriptGroup.autoPickupDurationDescriptio: Duration in seconds. 0 means don't auto pickup drops.
en-US.scriptGroup.executeKazuhaLongEAfterComba: Execute Kazuha Long E After Combat
After combat ends, if Kaedehara Kazuha is present, execute his long hold E skill to help collect materials
en-US.scriptGroup.pickupCombatThresholdDescrip: Pickup combat threshold. When combat count is less than a certain number and combat ends, don't trigger drop pickup and Kazuha pickup configuration. Only effective when not less than 2.
en-US.scriptGroup.onlyPickupEliteDropsDescript: Requires path file support and monster pickup differentiation enabled. Can be viewed through repository tags. Elite monsters can be marked in point's More > Extended Configuration > Monster Tags. Only picks up points marked as elite or legendary. Non-elite auto pickup: drops at feet during combat can be automatically picked up, but won't execute Kazuha pickup and auto pickup logic. Non-elite pickup disabled: drops at feet during combat won't be automatically picked up either.
en-US.scriptGroup.kazuhaPickupTeamNameDescript: After combat, if Kazuha is not present, switch to a team with Kazuha (based on Kazuha pickup being enabled and team name being filled, will switch). Suitable when you need an extra person for experience farming, replacing Kazuha's position. Combat strategy should be compatible with both teams in case team switching fails but combat continues.
en-US.scriptGroup.combatTimeoutDescription: Automatically stop combat after this time has elapsed
en-US.scriptGroup.shellExecutionConfigDescript: Shell commands in this group will use these settings. If disabled, default configuration will be used.
en-US.scriptGroup.disableShellTasksDescription: When enabled, shell tasks will be skipped
en-US.scriptGroup.shellExecutionTimeoutDescrip: Maximum time to wait for command to return, in seconds. If time <= 0, doesn't wait and returns immediately.
en-US.scriptGroup.hideCommandWindowDescription: Recommended to enable, otherwise there will be a large black box.
en-US.scriptGroup.logCommandOutputDescription: When enabled, command output will be shown in log. When disabled, output won't be shown. (Only shows when command executes successfully and has output)
en-US.scriptGroup.pathingActionConfigDescripti: Map tracking will execute certain actions when reaching target points. Some actions require configuring the position of corresponding characters in the team.
en-US.scriptGroup.normalAttackCharacterIndexDe: Generally used for collecting plants that require elemental reactions
en-US.scriptGroup.elementalSkillCharacterIndex: Used for collecting items like Cor Lapis

zh-CN.scriptGroup.gadgetIntervalMs: 使用小道具的间隔时间（毫秒）
zh-CN.scriptGroup.gadgetIntervalDescription: 在移动期间自动使用小道具，填0为不使用
zh-CN.scriptGroup.onlyInTeleportRecoverDescrip: 只有路径在传送点时，才会去七天神像恢复
zh-CN.scriptGroup.skipDuringDescription: 当执行完一个路线后，如果时间为当前配置的时间（范围：0-23），则此地图追踪任务后续都将都跳过，适用于连续执行的兜底任务，例如想通宵挂机，并且在4点后，开始执行新的任务。
zh-CN.scriptGroup.optimizeSkillCd: 根据技能CD优化出招人员
zh-CN.scriptGroup.optimizeSkillCdDescription: 根据填入人或人和cd，来决定当此人元素战技cd未结束时，跳过此人出招，来优化战斗流程，可填入人名或人名数字（用逗号分隔），多种用分号分隔，例如:白术;钟离,12;，如果人名，则用内置cd检查（或填入数字也小于0），如果是人名和数字，则把数字当做出招cd(秒)。
zh-CN.scriptGroup.autoCombatEndDetectionDescri: 检测到战斗已经结束的情况下，停止自动战斗功能
zh-CN.scriptGroup.quickCombatEndCheckDescripti: 快速检查战斗结束，在一轮脚本中，可以每隔一定秒数（默认为5）或指定角色操作后，去检查（在每个角色完成该轮脚本时）。
zh-CN.scriptGroup.quickCombatEndCheckParams: 更快检查结束战斗参数
zh-CN.scriptGroup.quickCombatEndCheckParamsDes: 快速检查战斗结束的参数，可填入数字和人名，多种用分号分隔，例如:5;白术;钟离;，如果是数字（小于等于0则不会根据时间去检查，单位为秒），则指定检查间隔，如果是人名，则该角色执行一轮操作后进行检查。同时每轮结束后检查不变。
zh-CN.scriptGroup.combatEndCheckDelayDescripti: 检查战斗结束的延时，不同角色招式结束后的延时不一定相同，默认为1.5秒。也可以指定特定角色之后延时多少秒检查，未指定角色名，则默认为该值。格式如：2.5;白术,1.5;钟离,1.0;
zh-CN.scriptGroup.keyPressCheckDelayDescriptio: 按下切换队伍后去检查屏幕色块的延时，默认为0.45秒。若频繁误判可以适当提高这个值，比如到0.75。确保这个延时不会真的把队伍配置界面切出来。
zh-CN.scriptGroup.autoPickupDropsDescription: 战斗结束后尽可能拾取周围掉落物（与万叶配合更佳）
zh-CN.scriptGroup.autoPickupDurationDescriptio: 单位为秒。0表示不自动拾取掉落物。
zh-CN.scriptGroup.executeKazuhaLongEAfterComba: 战斗结束后执行万叶长E
战斗结束后，如果存在枫原万叶，则战斗结束后执行万叶长E，使用该角色捡材料
zh-CN.scriptGroup.pickupCombatThresholdDescrip: 拾取战斗人次阈值,当战斗人次小于一定次数，就结束战斗情况下，不触发拾取掉落物和万叶拾取配置，只有不小于2时才生效。
zh-CN.scriptGroup.onlyPickupEliteDropsDescript: 需要路径文件支持，需勾选区分怪物拾取才生效，可通过仓库标签查看，精英怪物可以在点位的更多》扩展配置》怪物标签中，可标记。只拾取标记为精英或传奇的点位。非精英允许自动拾取：战斗过程中掉落脚下的可以自动拾取，但不会执行万叶拾取和自动拾取配置逻辑。非精英关闭拾取：战斗过程中掉落到脚下的也不会自动拾取。
zh-CN.scriptGroup.kazuhaPickupTeamNameDescript: 战斗结束后，如果不存在万叶，则切换至存在万叶的队伍（基于开启万叶拾取情况下，并且填写队伍名才会切换），适用于需要多一个人刷经验时，替换调万叶的位置，战斗策略建议兼容两个队伍的，以防止队伍切换不成功也能继续战斗。
zh-CN.scriptGroup.combatTimeoutDescription: 当战斗超过一定时间后，自动停止战斗
zh-CN.scriptGroup.shellExecutionConfigDescript: 在本组中执行Shell命令会使用这里的配置。如关闭此项，则使用默认配置。
zh-CN.scriptGroup.disableShellTasksDescription: 如果打开，则Shell任务会被跳过执行
zh-CN.scriptGroup.shellExecutionTimeoutDescrip: 最长等待命令返回的时间，单位秒。如果时间<=0则不等待，直接返回。
zh-CN.scriptGroup.hideCommandWindowDescription: 推荐启用，不然会有一个大黑框。
zh-CN.scriptGroup.logCommandOutputDescription: 打开的话若命令有输出会在Log中显示，关闭则不显示。(只有命令执行成功且有输出才会显示)
zh-CN.scriptGroup.pathingActionConfigDescripti: 地图追踪到达目标点的时候会执行一些动作，有些动作必须配置对应角色在队伍内的位置
zh-CN.scriptGroup.normalAttackCharacterIndex: 进行普通攻击的角色在队伍内的编号
zh-CN.scriptGroup.normalAttackCharacterIndexDe: 一般用于收集需要元素反应才能采集的植物
zh-CN.scriptGroup.elementalSkillCharacterIndex: 释放元素战技的角色在队伍内的编号
